General.Name: Gan Ltd
General.Description: GAN Limited operates as a business-to-business (B2B) supplier of enterprise software-as-a-service solutions to iGaming and online sports betting applications in the United States, Europe, Latin America, and internationally. It operates through two segments: B2B and B2C. The company offers GameSTACK, an internet gaming platform that provides turnkey technology solution for regulated real money internet gambling (RMiG), online sports gaming, and virtual simulated gaming. It also provides GAN Sports, an online and retail sports betting technology platform that operates through an internet connected self-service kiosks deployed at casino properties and mobile solutions; and super remote gaming server, simulated gaming, iSight back office, iBridge framework, and customer support services, as well as initial deployment of gaming hosting facilities and ongoing development services. In addition, the company develops and operates an online sports betting and casino platform under that Coolbet brand, as well as provides international users with access through www.coolbet.com to its sportsbook, casino games, and poker products. It serves regional operators and individual tribal casino operators. GAN Limited was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Las Vegas, Nevada.
General.Address: 10845 Griffith Peak Drive, Las Vegas, NV, United States, 89135
